meta.name: description
meta.content: Kemp ISD serves K-12 grade students and is located in Kemp, TX.

div.div: Intermediate students singing at Nursing home

td.br:
Date: 4/30/2020
Location: Kemp High School Auditorium

td.a: Second Grade Transition Day (2nd graders visit)
Second Grade Transition Parent Meeting 4:30pm and 6:00pm

h1.a: Update for At-Home Learning, Evidence, and Support

section.p: Parents, please click the headline and read the letter giving updates in regards to At-Home Learning procedures for our Kemp ISD students.

h1.a: Physical School Closure with Continued At-Home Learning

section.p: With the press conference held earlier today (April 17) by Governor Abbott, Kemp ISD, along with ALL other Texas Public Schools, will not physically re-open for the remainder of the 2019-2020 School Year. Please click the headline for details.

h1.a: Letters of Notification on Virus Exposure

section.p: Kemp ISD wants you to stay healthy. Together we can flatten the curve and stop the Spread of COVID-19. Please click the headline to see tips on how we can achieve these goals.
Our Meal Service Program will be extended out into the community starting Monday, April 13th at the following 3 locations every MONDAY and WEDNESDAY. Please Click the Headline for additional details.

h1.a: At-Home Packet Instructions: Turn in & Pick up

section.p: Please click on the headline to read a PDF file that outlines the steps to turn in the 1st At-Home instruction packet and pick up the 2nd At-Home instruction packet.

The enrollment process for Head Start and Pre-K will now be done online. You can reach the application at any time by going to this web address, https://headstart.region10.org or by scanning the QR Code in the PDF flyer, by clicking the headline above. If you have, any questions please feel free to call Rachel Prince at (903) 347-3156.

h1.a: Kemp ISD School Board Election Postponed

section.p: The Kemp ISD Board of Trustees approved the Proclamation to Postpone the May 2, 2020, Kemp ISD School Board Election to November 3, 2020.
